_header: This good book Recluse here now maketh end
_description: Couplet at end of a prose Regula anachoritarum

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Þis good book Recluse here now makeþ endeVn to þe
                    bllis of heuen god graunte vs grace to wende

                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
